What are the genetic changes related to X-linked severe combined immunodeficiency ?,"Mutations in the IL2RG gene cause X-linked SCID. The IL2RG gene provides instructions for making a protein that is critical for normal immune system function. This protein is necessary for the growth and maturation of developing immune system ce
